amendment.purpose: An amendment to require a GAO report that reviews the claims processing of OPIC to include an analysis of the claims paid, settled, and denied.

action.text: Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Menendez to the Terry amendment (A007).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Menendez amendment (A008) Agreed to by recorded vote: 259 - 169 (Roll no. 497).
